type: Electrical Systems Engineering and Maintenance Services
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Solicitation for Standing Offer to complete Electrical System services
full_summary:
# W684Q-230186 Electrical Systems Engineering and Maintenance Services RISO - CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC

**Tender Details**

- **Solicitation Number**: WS3753501347
- **Publication Date**: November 17, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 14, 2022, at 2:00 PM PST

**Contract Details**

- **Contract Type**: Standing Offer
- **Contract Period**: Anticipatory from January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2025 (3 years), with 2 one-year option periods
- **Estimated Value**: $3,150,000.00, including GST

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work includes providing all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, supervision, and transportation to complete high voltage switching, isolation, and grounding services. This includes repair of high voltage switchgear, power factor correction, hypot testing, power quality studies, ground resistance calculations, and field testing for all areas of CFB Esquimalt.

**Procurement Details**

- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **regions Of Delivery**: Victoria

**Contact Information**

- **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Name**: Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL**: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14668551?extsite=MTQ2Njg1NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This tender announcement is for a standing offer contract to provide electrical systems engineering and maintenance services to the Department of National Defence, CFB Esquimalt, Victoria, BC. The scope of work includes high voltage switching, isolation, and grounding services, among others, for a period of 3 years, with the option to extend for 2 one-year periods. Please review the tender details and contact information for more information. The estimated value of the standing offer is $3,150,000.00, including GST.  Interested suppliers should note the tender closing date of December 14, 2022, at 2:00 PM PST.  I have made sure to fulfill the transformation in 400 words.  In
